sep.gaia.resources.weather

Class WeatherManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.resources.ResourceObservable<R>
      • sep.gaia.resources.DataResourceManager<WeatherResource>
        • sep.gaia.resources.weather.WeatherManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoaderEventListener<WeatherResource>, StateObserver

    public class WeatherManager
extends DataResourceManager<WeatherResource>
implements LoaderEventListener<WeatherResource>
    Manages the WeatherResource objects and is a StateObserver by its inheritance of DataResourceManager. WeatherManager is also a ResourceObservable because of its inheritance of DataResourceManager. WeatherManager is responsible to load current weather data as WeatherResource objects according to the current FloatBoundingBox.
    Author:
    Johannes Bauer

      The minimal zoom level in tile value at which a weather manager starts to be active.

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeatherManager

        public WeatherManager()
        The constructor creates a new weather loader and a new temporary cache. All loaded WeatherResource objects are hold in this cache and are deleted, if it's full.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(WeatherResource dummy)
        Loads weather data for the overgiven WeatherResource dummy. The loading procedure is done in a separate thread.
        Parameters:
        dummy - The WeatherResource dummy. This means the dummy object has a specified geographical position, but contains not any weather information yet.

      • getCurrentWeatherResource

        public WeatherResource getCurrentWeatherResource()
        Returns the current used WeatherResource object. "Current" means, the observed state refers to a specific place (indicated by the FloatBoundingBox bbox member) in world and the referring WeatherResource object holds the weather status for this place.
        Returns:
        WeatherResource object to the current location, indicated by the FloatBoundingBox bbox member.

      • onUpdate

        public void onUpdate(State state)
        Description copied from interface: StateObserver
        This method specifies what action is taken when the observed State object is changed.
        Specified by:
        onUpdate in interface StateObserver
        Parameters:
        state - the observed State object that has changed

      • requestLoaderStop

        public void requestLoaderStop()
        Description copied from class: DataResourceManager
        This method sends a message to the loader to tell it to quit for the next possible moment.
        Specified by:
        requestLoaderStop in class DataResourceManager<WeatherResource>

      • onResourcesAvailable

        public void onResourcesAvailable(java.util.Collection<WeatherResource> resources)
        Description copied from interface: LoaderEventListener
        Will be called if the loader the implementation of this listener is assigned to, has partially processed a query.
        Specified by:
        onResourcesAvailable in interface LoaderEventListener<WeatherResource>
        Parameters:
        resources - The loaded resources mixed with dummy-objects representing those not yet loaded.
